channel.title: Seasonality on My take on data
channel.description: Recent content in Seasonality on My take on data

item.title: Modeling Birth Rates Part 2: By Month
item.description: In Part 1, I modeled births at the year level, which didn’t seem to have much seasonality. Now I’m going to try to model the monthly birth rates in the US. Predicting Seasonality I hit up the UN data to get seasonal birthrates, which I couldn’t find at CDC. Unfortunately, the UN data doesn’t have a long range of data.
